LanguageData.P2_BannedRemoveRoof: Vanila: Prioritizing roof removal work can cause pawns to remove roofs in wrong order, causing roofs to fall.
LanguageData.P2_PrioritizeThingDesc: Prioritize various stuffs. Change filter settings to select what you want. Ctrl + Mouse wheel to change priority.
LanguageData.P2_PrioritizeZoneDesc: Prioritize specific area. Ctrl + Mouse wheel to change priority.
